title: Westcott 13901 8-Inch Titanium Scissors For Office and Home, Yellow/Gray, 2 Pack
description: Westcott Titanium-Bonded Scissors are lighter, stronger, and sharper than other home or office shears. Lightweight yet durable enough for any cutting job, Westcott scissors feature high-performance titanium-bonded blades that boast three times the strength of stainless steel and resist corrosion. Ideal for cutting paper, cardboard, lightweight line, fabric, and other materials, these all-purpose scissors feature straight handles with a contoured soft handle for enhanced comfort. Westcott, the leader in cutting technology, brings you a coordinated assortment of all the essential tools you need to bring your ideas to life.
